title: ArbitrageVault BookFinder
description: Full-stack application with automated product discovery, pricing analysis, and opportunity scoring for book arbitrage. Built with FastAPI, React, and PostgreSQL over 13 development phases.

phases.title: Foundation Infrastructure
phases.description: Initial FastAPI backend setup with SQLAlchemy ORM, batch management system, and Render deployment configuration.

phases.title: Database Migration to Neon
phases.description: Migrated from Render PostgreSQL to Neon PostgreSQL for better connection pooling and performance. Achieved 15x improvement in concurrent connections.

phases.title: Keepa API Integration
phases.description: Real Keepa API integration for product data retrieval. Implemented BSR history tracking, price volatility analysis, and velocity scoring.

phases.title: Business Logic & Scoring
phases.description: Advanced analytics endpoints for product analysis, risk scoring, and buy/skip recommendations. Niche discovery with intelligent scoring.

phases.title: Token Control Safeguards
phases.description: Implemented AutoScheduler for job management and token safeguards to prevent API waste. Added @require_tokens decorator for endpoint protection.

phases.title: Frontend E2E Tests
phases.description: 56 Playwright E2E tests covering all user flows. Added FBA seller competition filter, Smart Velocity, and Budget Guard features.

phases.title: AutoSourcing Production
phases.description: Complete AutoSourcing module with job management, tier breakdown, profiles, and action tracking. Real Keepa API integration for product discovery.

phases.title: Advanced Analytics
phases.description: Enhanced analytics with historical trends, ASIN tracking, and comprehensive statistics. Added configuration management with change history.

phases.title: UI Completion
phases.description: Polished frontend components, improved error handling, and enhanced user experience across all features.

phases.title: Unified Product Table
phases.description: Consistent product display across all features with sortable columns, filtering, and action buttons.

phases.title: Page Centrale Recherches
phases.description: Centralized 'Mes Recherches' page with 30-day retention for saved searches and results management.

phases.title: UX Mobile-First
phases.description: Complete mobile-first responsive redesign with touch-friendly UI, improved navigation, and performance optimization.

phases.title: Firebase Authentication
phases.description: Complete Firebase Authentication system with user sync, token verification, and protected endpoints.

challenges.title: Connection Pool Exhaustion
challenges.context: Render PostgreSQL was hitting connection limits with only 20 connections, causing timeouts under load.
challenges.solution: Migrated to Neon PostgreSQL with connection pooling supporting 300-500 concurrent connections.

challenges.title: Keepa Data Parsing
challenges.context: Keepa API returns complex nested data structures with varying formats across product types.
challenges.solution: Built Keepa Parser v2 with defensive programming, optional chaining, and comprehensive error handling.
challenges.outcome: Reliable data extraction with graceful degradation on edge cases.

challenges.title: BSR Tuple Unpacking
challenges.context: BSR data sometimes came as tuples, sometimes as integers, causing TypeError crashes.
challenges.solution: Implemented type checking and flexible parsing in keepa_parser_v2 to handle all formats.
challenges.outcome: AutoSourcing stable in production with diverse product data.

challenges.title: Token Waste Prevention
challenges.context: Early development wasted Keepa API tokens on repeated failed requests.
challenges.solution: Implemented Budget Guard with @require_tokens decorator and retry logic with exponential backoff.
